short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin will help you connect Albanian platfoms to agjenti.al

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is meant to be used by real estate agents that are users of agjenti.al. agjenti.al has integrated support for Albanian platforms that don't have an API to connect, thus the connection is done by retrieving the cookies on those sites.

The plugin only works for those platforms.
